column2: working as senior character concept artist for 38 Studios.<ref>[http://www.blogger.com/profile/15218470159206068929 Jeff Murchie Profile] at [http://www.blogger.com Blogger.com] (accessed 23 September 2011)</ref> He has created much of the concept art for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''
column3: in which he says to have been influenced by the works of [[Angus McBride]].<ref>[http://murchiemonster.blogspot.com/2011/05/angmarim-chief.html Angmarim Chief] at [http://murchiemonster.blogspot.com/ MurchieMonster.blogspot.com] (accessed 23 September 2011)</ref>
